**Description**  
Redesign the prompt card to use rounded-2xl corners, soft drop-shadow, and updated typography.

**Acceptance Criteria**  
- [ ] Card has rounded-2xl corners.  
- [ ] Soft drop-shadow applied.  
- [ ] Microcopy at 14px, prompt body at 22–24px, centered.
